item.title: Runa add a quote by J.K. Rowling
Runa add a quote by Ned Vizzini
item.description: "People are screwed up in this world. I'd rather be with someone screwed up and open about it than somebody perfect and ready to explode." -- Ned Vizzini

item.title: Runa add a quote by Ned Vizzini
item.description: "Its so hard to talk when you want to kill yourself. That's above and beyond everything else, and it's not a mental complaint-it's a physical thing, like it's physically hard to open your mouth and make the words come out. They don't come out smooth and in conjunction with your brain the way normal people's words do; they come out in chunks as if from a crushed-ice dispenser; you stumble on them as they gather behind your lower lip. So you just keep quiet." -- Ned Vizzini

item.title: Runa add a quote by Ned Vizzini
item.description: "That's all I can do. I'll keep at it and hope it gets better." -- Ned Vizzini

item.title: Runa add a quote by Ned Vizzini
item.description: "So now live for real, Craig. Live. Live. Live. Live." -- Ned Vizzini

item.title: Runa add a quote by Ned Vizzini
item.description: "I just want to not be me." -- Ned Vizzini

item.title: Runa add a quote by Libba Bray
Runa add a quote by Libba Bray
item.description: "War." Gorgon spits the word. "That is what they call it to give the illusion of honor and law. It is chaos. Madness and blood and the hunger to win. It has always been thus and shall always be so." -- Libba Bray

item.title: Runa add a quote by Libba Bray
Runa add a quote by Nelson Mandela
item.description: "No one is born hating another person because of the color of his skin, or his background, or his religion. People must learn to hate, and if they can learn to hate, they can be taught to love, for love comes more naturally to the human heart than its opposite." -- Nelson Mandela

item.title: Runa add a quote by Susane Colasanti
item.description: "No one should be ashamed to speak up. Shame makes it easy for neglect and abuse and bullying to stay huddled together in their dark corner. It’s time to throw the switch on this spotlight. If I can inspire other kids to speak their truth, then everything I’ve been through will have been worth it." -- Susane Colasanti

item.title: Runa add a quote by Susane Colasanti
item.description: "I’ve already lived through the worst time of my life. So I know that whatever happens to me from now on, nothing will ever be as bad as it was back then. That makes me happy." -- Susane Colasanti

item.title: Runa add a quote by Susane Colasanti
item.description: "If you see someone being bullied, make it stop. Why is that so hard for us to do?" -- Susane Colasanti

item.title: Runa add a quote by John Green
item.description: "Before I got here, I thought for a long time that the way out of the labyrinth was to pretend that it did not exist, to build a small, self-sufficient world in the back corner of the endless maze and to pretend that I was not lost, but home." -- John Green

item.title: Runa add a quote by John Green
item.description: "You have a choice in this world, I believe, about how to tell sad stories, and we made the funny choice." -- John Green

item.title: Runa add a quote by John Green
item.description: "Caring doesn't sometimes lead to misery. It always does." -- John Green

item.title: Runa add a quote by John Green
item.description: "God I love rainbows." -- John Green

item.title: Runa add a quote by John Green
item.description: "Adult librarians are like lazy bakers: their patrons want a jelly doughnut, so they give them a jelly doughnut. Children’s librarians are ambitious bakers: 'You like the jelly doughnut? I’ll get you a jelly doughnut. But you should try my cruller, too. My cruller is gonna blow your mind, kid." -- John Green

item.title: Runa add a quote by John Green
item.description: "I have an Augustus Waters fetish." -- John Green

item.title: Runa add a quote by John Green
item.description: "We acknowledge that being the person God made you cannot separate you from God's love." -- John Green

item.title: Runa add a quote by John Green
item.description: "Islam and Christianity promise eternal paradise to the faithful. And that is a powerful opiate, certainly, the hope of a better life to come. But there's a Sufi story that challenges the notion that people believe only because they need an opiate. Rabe'a al-Adiwiyah, a great woman saint of Sufism, was seem running through the streets of her hometown, Basra, carrying a torch in one hand and a bucket of water in the other. When someone asked her what she was doing, she answered, 'I am going to take this bucket of water and pour it on the flames of hell, and then I am going to use this torch to burn down the gates of paradise so that people will not love God for want of heaven of fear of hell, but because He is God." -- John Green

item.title: Runa add a quote by John Green
item.description: "You realize that trying to keep your distance from me will not lessen my affection for you," he said." -- John Green

item.title: Runa add a quote by John Green
item.description: "I don't really care how people read. I care if people read." -- John Green

item.title: Runa add a quote by John Green
item.description: "Suffering is universal. it’s the one thing Buddhists, Christians, and Muslims are all worried about." -- John Green

item.title: Runa add a quote by John Green
item.description: "Oh, God, Alaska, I love you. I love you,' and the Colonel whispered, 'I'm so sorry, Pudge. I know you did,' and I said, 'No. Not past tense." -- John Green

item.title: Runa add a quote by John Green
item.description: "I am concussed," I announced, entirely sure of my self-diagnosis." -- John Green

item.title: Runa add a quote by John Green
item.description: "I don't think God gives a shit if we have a dog or if a woman wears shorts. I think He gives a shit whether you're a good person." -- John Green

item.title: Runa add a quote by John Green
item.description: "Use your words" -- John Green

item.title: Runa add a quote by John Green
item.description: "I'm not embarrassed by my faith, and I'm also not embarrassed by my doubt." -- John Green

item.title: Runa add a quote by John Green
item.description: "there is no best and no worst, ...those judgments have no real meaning because there is only what is" -- John Green
